phrs.translation: 神经心理学家, 理学家

sentences.translation: 神经心理学家卢茨·詹克同意这一观点。

sentences.sentence: The neuropsychologist says that we can only say that Bella Devyatkina has some truly special abilities in 15-20 years.
sentences.translation: 这位神经心理学家说，只有再过15-20年，我们才敢说贝拉•德瓦特基那真的拥有特殊才能。

sentences.sentence: The study is well done, says neuropsychologist Felicia Goldstein, an associate professor of neurology at Emory University School of Medicine, in Atlanta.
sentences.translation: 神经学副教授、神经心理学家费丽雪.戈德斯特称赞该项目，她来自亚特兰大的艾莫瑞大学医学院。
